title: Instruction Letter For Grades And Academic Evaluation (ISR-C230-01) | Yönerge
text: Instruction No ISR-C230-01-V05 Effective Date 15-12-2013 Update Date 15-12-2013 Related Unit / Owner SR / Öğrenci Kaynakları Direktörlüğü Approved by BT / Board of Trustees Aim Scope Principle Statutory Basis Definitions / Abbreviations Regulations Related Procedures Procedure For Submission Of Final Grades Into System And Change In Grades (PSR-C230-0101) Procedure For Academic Standing Evaluation (PSR-C230-0102) Procedure For Transcript Preparation (PSR-C230-0103) Related Forms Grade Change Form (FSR-C23001-01) The List of Non-Graded or "I" Grade Courses (FSR-C23001-02) Grade Delay Fee Report (FSR-C23001-03) Rang Information Document (FSR-C23001-04) High Honor Certificates Delivery List (FSR-C23001-05) Transcript Request Form (FSR-C23001-10) Related Form Links
